text: On September 5th and 6th at Hosei University Ichigaya campus, the Okinawa Festival in Tokyo is not over after the war ~ is done. PM: Migration is the biggest challenge facing countries in Europe today & Britain has a moral responsibility to help refugees #Syria

PM: Britain will act with our head and our heart, providing refuge for those in need while working on a long term solution to #Syria crisis

The UK will provide resettlement for more Syrian refugees, taking them from camps. This is on top of our existing £900m programme (1/2).
Taking refugees direct from camps allows a safe route to the UK, rather than the hazardous journey that's cost so many lives (2/2).
